addRewardBand(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Add a new reward band to the end of the array

params.maxAmount: Maximum cumulative platform amount for this band (USDT 6 decimals)
params.minAmount: Minimum cumulative platform amount for this band (USDT 6 decimals)
params.owPerDollar: OW tokens awarded per USDT (18 decimals)

clearAllRewardBands().details: Clear all reward bands (use with extreme caution!) Should only be used for emergency resets

getUserTotalClaimableTokens(address).details: Calculate user's total claimable tokens (simplified for sync) This is the main function NOWJC calls for cross-chain sync

markTokensClaimed(address,uint256).details: Mark tokens as claimed (called by NOWJC after successful cross-chain claim)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

processJobPayment(address,address,uint25.details: Process job payment and award tokens to users Called by NOWJC when payment is released

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

recordGovernanceAction(address).details: Record governance action for user in current band Called by NOWJC when user performs governance action

removeLastRewardBand().details: Remove the last reward band Safer than removing by index as it doesn't affect other bands

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

resetRewardBands().details: Reset and reinitialize reward bands (owner only) Used to fix corrupted storage from failed initialization

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.index: Index of the band to update

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.
